title: Bug 17894: Open Mode preference not reset by Restore Defaults
description: The Open Mode preference in Workbench preferences does not reset to the default setting and does not clear the two checkboxes when Restore Defaults is selected.
OB: The Open Mode preference in Workbench preferences is expected to revert to the default setting of Double Click and clear both checkboxes when Restore Defaults is selected.
EB: When selecting Single Click as the Open Mode preference and selecting both checkboxes, then choosing Restore Defaults in Workbench preferences, the Open Mode preference should revert to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open Build 20020521.
2. Go to Workbench preferences.
3. Change the Open Mode preference to Single Click and select both checkboxes.
4. Click on the Restore Defaults button.
5. Observe that the Open Mode preference does not revert to Double Click and the checkboxes are not cleared.
